response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an exceptional value, allowing you to secure this high-quality item at a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fantastic chance for you to benefit from the unique features and advantages this product provides. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
